entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:36 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 09:54 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.5°C

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 12 January 2023
